title: GetSubordinateCount (Method)
text:
METHOD GetSubordinateCount : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the number of subordinates and a subordinate anotations in the Subordinate_List-Property and
the Subordinate_Annotations-Property of this BACnet-Object. Both the subordinate and its annotation have to have the
same number of entries, so only one count is returned.

rows.Name: count
rows.Comment: The count of subordinates after the method call.
